div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 2068 Passo di Piazza (anc. Gela), 1934 Burial: c. 480-78 B.C. (Jenkins) Contents: 45 AR Acragas: 6 didr. Gela: 19 didr. (to Jenkins 82) Messana: 1 didr. (mule-car/hare) Syracuse: 18 tetradr. (to Boehringer 85 ?) 1 didr. Disposition: Syracuse Currò Pisanò, AIIN 1962-4, p. 227 (listed as 1934 = Gela) Jenkins, Gela, pp. 21-2, 156
